column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Coming from Los Angeles
column2: I would never claim to be a pizza aficionado
column3: but my boyfriend used to live in Chicago and he is a pizza fiend. So
column4: when we decided to visit there
column5: this place was on the top of his list. THANK GOODNESS!!! Now
column7: but I'm not a huge sauce person
column8: so I was skeptical. I take it back
column9: I do!! The pizza is SOO good. It's cheesy and the crust is slightly crunch on the outside and buttery
column10: and then it all just melts together. The sauce is light and sweet
